message:
Kindly help me ,
I got windows azure error "an error occurred while processing your request" when i tried to access a web site is hosted in Windows Azure with SQL database
Hint: When i access the database from my local visual studio it is working well , So the connection string is correct

data.message: try to get the detailed error message not the custom one

you can find the detailed error message in the Website Log under Dashboard tab  called : Management Services >Operation Logs.
and make sure that if you are using a SQL Azure database it has been added as a linked resource in the website.
@eslam: is it a must? to add the database as linked resource?

not sure, but i think because they are preventing any remote connection unless the IP in the white list, and adding it to the linked resource will bypass this issue. also Visual Studio is making this for you if you are logged with your Azure Account.
أحمد محمود محمد عبدالوهاب this is the detailed error
Eslam Hamouda  There's no operation logs

hwa dh el full stack trace? 
w fi repository ll app wala hwa private wala eh?
